TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit HttpCacheVaryByHeaders extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供一种类型安全的方式来设置 属性。

span.span: Provides a type-safe way to set the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性标识 ASP.NET 用来唯一标识的响应的一种变体，当有多个资源的缓存的响应的请求标头参数。The property identifies which request header parameters ASP.NET uses to uniquely identify a variation of the response when there are multiple cached responses for a resource. 当响应依赖于一组客户端输入，如标头或参数时，这很有用。This is useful when a response depends on a set of client inputs, such as headers or parameters. 不直接与 HTTP 缓存控制标头，但可以帮助确保客户端或代理因指定的标头。The is not directly related to HTTP cache-control headers, but helps ensure that a client or proxy varies by the specified headers. 有关详细信息`VaryByHeaders`，请参阅 RFC 2616： 超文本传输协议-HTTP/1.1，位于[World Wide Web 联合会 (W3C) 网站](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37125)。For more information about `VaryByHeaders`, see RFC 2616: Hypertext Transfer Protocol -- HTTP/1.1, available on the [World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) Web site](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37125). 请参阅完整的详细信息部分 14，"标头字段定义"。See section 14, "Header Field Definitions", for complete details.

related.span: 缓存的页面的多个版本

span.span: Caching Multiple Versions of a Page

related.span: 如何： 缓存的页上，根据 HTTP 标头版本

span.span: How to: Cache Versions of a Page, Based on HTTP Headers

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool AcceptTypes { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.AcceptTypes : bool with get, set

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示 ASP.NET 输出缓存是否随 HTTP 标头而改变缓存的响应，并将该标头追加到传出的 HTTP 标头。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the ASP.NET output cache varies the cached responses by the HTTP header, and appends it to the out-going HTTP header.

value.span: 当 ASP.NET 输出缓存随 标头而改变时，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: when the ASP.NET output cache varies by the header; otherwise, .
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks `Vary`标头指示服务器而异的响应的请求标头字段`Accept`字段，并指定服务器选择根据到客户端接受的媒体类型的响应。The `Vary` header indicates the request-header fields that the server varies the response by the `Accept` field and specifies that the server selects the response based on the media types acceptable to the client. HTTP 标头的详细信息，请参阅 RFC 2616： 超文本传输协议-HTTP/1.1，可在上找到[World Wide Web 联合会 (W3C) 网站](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37125)。For more information on HTTP headers, see RFC 2616: Hypertext Transfer Protocol -- HTTP/1.1, available on the [World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) Web site](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37125). 请参阅完整的详细信息部分 14，"标头字段定义"。See section 14, "Header Field Definitions", for complete details. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何执行一些操作仅当属性是`true`。This following code example demonstrates how some action is performed only if the property is `true`. [!code-csharp[Classic HttpCacheVaryByHeaders.AcceptTypes Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HttpCacheVaryByHeaders.AcceptTypes Example/cs/source.aspx#1)] [!code-vb[Classic HttpCacheVaryByHeaders.AcceptTypes Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HttpCacheVaryByHeaders.AcceptTypes Example/vb/source.aspx#1)]

span.span: The name of the custom header.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个自定义标头字段，ASP.NET 输出缓存将随该字段改变缓存的响应，并将其追加到传出的 HTTP 标头。

span.span: Gets or sets a custom header field that the ASP.NET output cache varies the cached responses by, and appends it to the out-going HTTP header.

value.span: 当 ASP.NET 输出缓存因指定的自定义字段;否则为。

span.span: when the ASP.NET output cache varies by the specified custom field; otherwise, .
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks `Vary`标头指示服务器而异的响应的请求标头字段。The `Vary` header indicates the request-header fields that the server varies the response by. 有关详细信息，请参阅 RFC 2616： 超文本传输协议-HTTP/1.1，可在上找到[World Wide Web 联合会 (W3C) 网站](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37125)。For more information, see RFC 2616: Hypertext Transfer Protocol -- HTTP/1.1, available on the [World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) Web site](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37125). 请参阅完整的详细信息部分 14，"标头字段定义"。See section 14, "Header Field Definitions", for complete details. 方法将在内部调用，如果指定`header`具有值 \* （星号）。The method is called internally if the specified `header` has the value \* (an asterisk).

span.span: is .

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示 ASP.NET 输出缓存是否随 标头改变缓存的响应，并将该标头追加到传出的 HTTP 标头。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the ASP.NET output cache varies the cached responses by the header, and appends it to the out-going HTTP header.

value.span: 当 ASP.NET 输出缓存随 标头而变化并将该标头添加到被发送到客户端的 HTTP 标头时，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: when the ASP.NET output cache varies by the header, and adds it to the HTTP header sent to the client; otherwise, .
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks `Vary`标头指示服务器使用以确定其中多个缓存的响应发送到客户端请求的响应中的请求标头字段。The `Vary` header indicates the request-header fields that the server uses to determine which of multiple cached responses is sent in response to a client request. `User-Agent`字段指定服务器选择基于客户端的用户代理类型的响应。The `User-Agent` field specifies that the server selects the response based on the client's user-agent type. 有关详细信息，请参阅 RFC 2616： 超文本传输协议-HTTP/1.1，可在上找到[World Wide Web 联合会 (W3C) 网站](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37125)。For more information, see RFC 2616: Hypertext Transfer Protocol -- HTTP/1.1, available on the [World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) Web site](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37125). 请参阅完整的详细信息部分 14，"标头字段定义"。See section 14, "Header Field Definitions", for complete details. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何执行一些操作仅当属性是`true`。The following code example demonstrates how some action is performed only if the property is `true`. [!code-csharp[Classic HttpCacheVaryByHeaders.UserAgent Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HttpCacheVaryByHeaders.UserAgent Example/cs/source.aspx#1)] [!code-vb[Classic HttpCacheVaryByHeaders.UserAgent Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HttpCacheVaryByHeaders.UserAgent Example/vb/source.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示 ASP.NET 输出缓存是否随 标头改变缓存的响应，并将该标头追加到传出的 HTTP 标头。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the ASP.NET output cache varies the cached responses by the header, and appends it to the out-going HTTP header.

value.span: 当 ASP.NET 输出缓存随 标头而变化并将该标头添加到被发送到客户端的 HTTP 标头时，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: when the ASP.NET output cache varies by the header and adds it to the HTTP header sent to the client; otherwise, .
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks `Vary`标头指示服务器使用以确定其中多个缓存的响应发送到客户端请求的响应中的请求标头字段。The `Vary` header indicates the request-header fields that the server uses to determine which of multiple cached responses is sent in response to a client request. `Accept-CharSet`字段指定服务器选择响应基于客户端的字符集。The `Accept-CharSet` field specifies that the server selects the response based on the client's character set. 有关详细信息，请参阅 RFC 2616： 超文本传输协议-HTTP/1.1，可在上找到[World Wide Web 联合会 (W3C) 网站](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37125)。For more information, see RFC 2616: Hypertext Transfer Protocol -- HTTP/1.1, available on the [World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) Web site](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37125). 请参阅完整的详细信息部分 14，"标头字段定义"。See section 14, "Header Field Definitions", for complete details. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何执行一些操作仅当属性是`true`。The following code example demonstrates how some action is performed only if the property is `true`. [!code-csharp[Classic HttpCacheVaryByHeaders.UserCharSet Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HttpCacheVaryByHeaders.UserCharSet Example/cs/source.aspx#1)] [!code-vb[Classic HttpCacheVaryByHeaders.UserCharSet Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HttpCacheVaryByHeaders.UserCharSet Example/vb/source.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示 ASP.NET 输出缓存是否随 标头改变缓存的响应，并将该标头追加到传出的 HTTP 标头。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the ASP.NET output cache varies the cached responses by the header, and appends it to the out-going HTTP header.

value.span: 当 ASP.NET 输出缓存随 标头而变化并将该标头添加到被发送到客户端的 HTTP 标头时，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: when ASP.NET output cache varies by the header and adds it to the HTTP header sent to the client; otherwise, .
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks `Vary`标头指示服务器使用以确定其中多个缓存的响应发送到客户端请求的响应中的请求标头字段。The `Vary` header indicates the request-header fields that the server uses to determine which of multiple cached responses is sent in response to a client request. `Accept-Language`字段指定服务器选择响应基于接受客户端的语言。The `Accept-Language` field specifies that the server selects the response based on languages acceptable to the client. 有关详细信息，请参阅 RFC 2616： 超文本传输协议-HTTP/1.1，可在上找到[World Wide Web 联合会 (W3C) 网站](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37125)。For more information, see RFC 2616: Hypertext Transfer Protocol -- HTTP/1.1, available on the [World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) Web site](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37125). 请参阅完整的详细信息部分 14，"标头字段定义"。See section 14, "Header Field Definitions", for complete details. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何执行一些操作仅当属性是`true`。The following code example demonstrates how some action is performed only if the property is `true`. [!code-csharp[Classic HttpCacheVaryByHeaders.UserLanguage Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HttpCacheVaryByHeaders.UserLanguage Example/cs/source.aspx#1)] [!code-vb[Classic HttpCacheVaryByHeaders.UserLanguage Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HttpCacheVaryByHeaders.UserLanguage Example/vb/source.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void VaryByUnspecifiedParameters() cil managed

summary.span: 导致 ASP.NET 随所有标头值而变化，并将 HTTP 标头设置为值 \*（星号）。

span.span: Causes ASP.NET to vary by all header values and sets the HTTP header to the value \* (an asterisk).

summary.span: 所有其他 标头信息将被丢弃。

span.span: All other header information to be dropped.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `Vary`标头指示服务器使用以确定其中多个缓存的响应发送到客户端请求的响应中的请求标头字段。The `Vary` header indicates the request-header fields that the server uses to determine which of multiple cached responses is sent in response to a client request. \* 值指定在服务器选择响应基于未在请求标头 （例如，客户端的网络地址） 中指定的参数。The \* value specifies that the server selects the response based on parameters not specified in request headers (for example, the network address of the client). 有关详细信息，请参阅 RFC 2616： 超文本传输协议-HTTP/1.1，可在上找到[World Wide Web 联合会 (W3C) 网站](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37125)。For more information, see RFC 2616: Hypertext Transfer Protocol -- HTTP/1.1, available on the [World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) Web site](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37125). 请参阅完整的详细信息部分 14，"标头字段定义"。See section 14, "Header Field Definitions", for complete details.
